member.summary: Returns an ArrayList of PresetInfo objects for the specified 'target type name' on the specified presets platform (i.e., Win or Web)
member.remarks: This method looks for presets files in the standard folders. To find presets files in alternate folders use the overload that takes an array of DirectoryInfo or PresetInfo objects.

The type of presets to return, i.e., Appearance or Behavior
The platform (i.e., Win or Web) that the component runs on
Specify 'true' to return files containing Custom presets or 'false' to return files containing 'Standard' presets.

member.remarks: This method looks for presets files in a specified list of folders represented by a list of PresetFolderInfo objects. To find presets files in the standard folders use the overload that takes the requested preset platform and an 'IsCustom' flag.
member.param: A string representation of the type of the component whose Presets folder is to be returned
The type of presets to return, i.e., Appearance or Behavior
An array of PresetFolderInfo objects for each folder to be searched.

An array of DirectoryInfo objects for each folder to be searched.
